text: is a town located in Rumoi, Hokkaido, Japan. As of September 2016, the town has an estimated population of 3,241 and a density of 9.2 persons per km². The total area is 353.31 km². Homer, Alaska has been the sister city of Teshio since 1984, and Tomari, Russia since 1992.Russian presence in Niigata A view of Teshio from the coast ==References== ==External links== * *Official Website Category:Towns in Hokkaido
title: Teshio, Hokkaido
